revised_title: Critique of M. l'Abbe Barthelemy's Memoir on Phaenician Letters and Alphabets
tldr: The author critiques M. l'Abbe Barthelemy's memoir on Phaenician letters and alphabets, questioning the interpretations of inscriptions and challenging the accuracy of certain copies. The critique highlights discrepancies in Barthelemy's assertions and offers alternative interpretations of the Phaenician inscriptions.
